title: Location
description: A place in the galaxy, be it a world, continent, territory, town, building or room

id.description: Required. Unique identifier for the location.

type.description: Required. Defines what type this location is. Important to go from macro to micro scale.

biome.description: The biome of the location. If not specified, inherits from parent.

parent.description: If location is inside a different location, the id of that location
